sn15.6:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā … pe …
sn15.6:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn15.6:4.6: So na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassāni iti vā … pe …
sn15.6:5.3: “Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, āyasaṃ nagaraṃ yojanaṃ āyāmena yojanaṃ vitthārena yojanaṃ ubbedhena, puṇṇaṃ sāsapānaṃ guḷikābaddhaṃ.
sn15.6:5.4: Tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ sāsapaṃ uddhareyya.
sn15.6:5.5: Khippataraṃ kho so, bhikkhu, mahāsāsaparāsi iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, na tveva kappo.
sn15.6:5.7: Evaṃ dīghānaṃ kho, bhikkhu, kappānaṃ neko kappo saṃsito, nekaṃ kappasataṃ saṃsitaṃ, nekaṃ kappasahassaṃ saṃsitaṃ, nekaṃ kappasatasahassaṃ saṃsitaṃ.
